line.originaltext: 2 teaspoons olive oil
3 tablespoons finely chopped onion
1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing2, "1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed")

line.originaltext: 1 (10 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 (10 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon brown sugar
1/4 cup salsa
1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes
2 tablespoons butter, divided
8 (8 inch) flour tortillas
1 1/2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing9, "1 1/2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided")

line.originaltext: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing0, t0, ing10, "heated oil", "heat over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Stir in onion, and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
Stir in onion, and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing11, t0, ing12, "cooked onion", "cook until softened")

line.originaltext: Stir in beans and corn, then add sugar, salsa, and pepper flakes; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6}, ing13, "beans + corn", "mix")

line.originaltext: Cook until heated through, about 3 minutes.
Melt 2 teaspoons of the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
Place a tortilla in the skillet, sprinkle evenly with cheese, then top with some of the bean mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing19, ing9}, ing23, "tortilla", "sprinkle cheese to pwith beans")

line.originaltext: Place another tortilla on top, cook until golden, then flip and cook on the other side.
Repeat with remaining tortillas and filling.
line.annotation: combine({ing15, ing22, ing24}, ing25, "quesadillas", "do with remaining tortillas")
